name: ESCAPE 2107
description:
ESCAPE 2107 by Jonas Hansen

Escape an infinite array of vectorized spaces before time runs out.

controls

left / right key to rotate
up/down key to move
space to move upwards
esc to pause

credits

Made in Unity3D
